00013 string LoadShader(const char* source)
00014 {
00015     ifstream fin(source);
00016     if(!fin) 
00017     {
00018         string msg = "Cannot open shader ";
00019         msg += source;
00020         ShowMessage(msg.c_str(), false);
00021         return "null";
00022     }
00023     string data;
00024     char ch;
00025     while(fin.get(ch))
00026         data+=ch;
00027 
00028     return data;
00029 }

00049 TMaterial::TMaterial(const char* name, unsigned id, glm::vec3 amb, glm::vec3 diff, glm::vec3 spec, GLfloat shin, GLfloat reflect, GLfloat transp, GLint lm)
00050 {
00051     m_name = name;
00052     m_matID = id;
00053     m_ambColor = amb;
00054     m_diffColor = diff;
00055     m_specColor = spec;
00056     m_shininess = shin;
00057     m_reflection = reflect;
00058     m_transparency = transp;
00059     m_lightModel = lm;
00060     m_sceneID = 0;
00061 
00062     m_shader = 0;
00063     m_baked = false;
00064     m_useMRT = false;
00065     m_custom_shader = false;
00066     if(m_lightModel == SCREEN_SPACE)  //screen space quad cannot receive shadows
00067         m_receive_shadows = false;
00068     else
00069         m_receive_shadows = true;
00070     m_is_alpha = false;
00071     m_is_tessellated = false;
00072 }

00078 TMaterial::~TMaterial()
00079 {
00080     if(m_shader != 0)
00081     {
00082         glDetachObjectARB(m_shader,m_f_shader);
00083         glDetachObjectARB(m_shader,m_g_shader);
00084         glDetachObjectARB(m_shader,m_v_shader);
00085         glDeleteObjectARB(m_shader);
00086     }
00087     //free textures
00088     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); m_it++)
00089         delete m_it->second;
00090 }

00100 string TMaterial::NextTexture(string texname)
00101 {
00102     int i = 1;
00103     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00104     {
00106         if(texname == m_it->first || m_it->first.empty() )
00107         {
00108             string rep;
00109             rep = num2str(char('A' + i));
00110             texname.replace(texname.length()-1, rep.size(), rep.c_str());
00111             i++;
00112         }
00113     }
00114     return texname;
00115 }

00133 GLint TMaterial::AddTexture(const char *file, GLint textype, GLint texmode, GLfloat intensity, 
00134                             GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool mipmap, bool aniso, GLint cache)
00135 {
00137     string texname;
00138     switch(textype)
00139     {
00140         //base map
00141     case BASE: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "BaseA"); break;
00142         //alpha map
00143     case ALPHA: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "AlphaA"); m_is_alpha = true; break;
00144         //environment map
00145     case ENV: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "EnvA"); break;
00146         //bump map
00147     case BUMP: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "BumpA"); break;
00148         //parallax map
00149     case PARALLAX: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "ParallaxA"); break;   
00150         //displacement map
00151     case DISPLACE: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "DisplaceA"); break; 
00152         //cube map
00153     case CUBEMAP: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "CubeA"); break; 
00154         //environment cube map
00155     case CUBEMAP_ENV: texname = m_name + "CubeEnvA"; break;//NextTexture(m_name + "CubeEnvA"); break; 
00156         //render textures
00157     case RENDER_TEXTURE: 
00158     case RENDER_TEXTURE_MULTISAMPLE: 
00159         texname = file; 
00160         break; 
00161 
00162     default: texname = NextTexture(m_name + "BaseA"); break;
00163     };
00164 
00166     Texture *t = new Texture();
00167     m_textures[texname] = t;
00168     return m_textures[texname]->Load(texname.c_str(), textype, file, texmode, intensity, tileX, tileY, mipmap, aniso, cache);
00169 }

00185 GLint TMaterial::AddTexture(const char **files, GLint textype, GLint texmode, GLfloat intensity, 
00186                             GLfloat tileX, GLfloat tileY, bool aniso, GLint cache)
00187 {
00188 
00189     if(textype != CUBEMAP && textype != CUBEMAP_ENV)
00190     {
00191         cerr<<"ERROR: textype must be cubemap!\n";
00192         return -1;
00193     }
00194 
00196     string texname = NextTexture(m_name + "CubeA");
00197 
00199     Texture *t = new Texture();
00200     m_textures[texname] = t;
00201     return m_textures[texname]->Load(texname.c_str(), textype, files, texmode, intensity, tileX, tileY, aniso, cache);
00202 }

00213 void TMaterial::AddShadowMap(int type, GLuint map, GLfloat intensity)
00214 {
00215     //don't add shadow map for materials whose don't want to receive shadows!
00216     if(!m_receive_shadows) 
00217         return;
00218 
00220     string texname;
00221     if(type == OMNI)
00222         texname = NextTexture(m_name + "ShadowOMNI_A");
00223     else
00224         texname = NextTexture(m_name + "ShadowA");
00225 
00226     //create shadow texture
00227     Texture *shadow_tex = new Texture();
00228     shadow_tex->SetID(map);
00229     shadow_tex->SetName(texname);
00230 
00231     if(type == OMNI)
00232         shadow_tex->SetType(SHADOW_OMNI);
00233     else
00234         shadow_tex->SetType(SHADOW);
00235 
00237     if(m_transparency > 0.0) 
00238         intensity = m_transparency;
00239 
00240     shadow_tex->SetIntensity(intensity);
00241     //add into list
00242     m_textures[texname] = shadow_tex;
00243 }

00250 void TMaterial::RemoveShadows()
00251 {
00252     vector<string> to_erase;
00253 
00254     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00255         if(strstr(m_it->first.c_str(),"Shadow") != NULL)
00256             to_erase.push_back(m_it->first);
00257 
00258     for(unsigned i=0; i<to_erase.size(); i++)
00259         m_textures.erase(to_erase[i]);
00260 
00261 }

00268 void TMaterial::RenderMaterial()
00269 {
00271     glUseProgram(m_shader);
00272 
00274     int i=0;
00275     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00276     {
00277         if(!m_it->second->Empty())
00278         {
00279             m_it->second->ActivateTexture(i);
00280             i++;
00281         }
00282     }
00283 }

00297 bool TMaterial::CustomShader(TShader *vertex, TShader *tess_control, TShader *tess_eval, TShader *geometry, TShader *fragment)
00298 {
00299     //check OpenGL 4 support(when tessellation shaders present)
00300     m_is_tessellated = false;
00301     if(tess_control != NULL && tess_eval != NULL && !GLEW_ARB_gpu_shader5)
00302     {
00303         cout<<"OpenGL 4 not supported, can't use tessellation!\n";
00304         return false;
00305     }
00306 
00307     //create shaders for vertex and fragment shader
00308     m_v_shader = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00309     m_f_shader = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00310 
00311     //shader version. If OpenGL4 is supported, use 400, else 330
00312     string version = "#version 330 compatibility\n";
00313     if(GLEW_ARB_gpu_shader5)
00314         version = "#version 400 compatibility\n";
00315 
00316     //write shader header - version and defines
00317     string vertex_shader, fragment_shader, geometry_shader, tess_control_shader, tess_eval_shader;
00318     vertex_shader = version + vertex->defines;
00319     fragment_shader = version + fragment->defines;
00320 
00321     //load shader data
00322     vertex_shader += LoadShader(vertex->source.c_str());
00323     fragment_shader += LoadShader(fragment->source.c_str());
00324 
00325     if(vertex_shader == "null" || fragment_shader == "null")
00326         return false;
00327 
00328     const char *ff = fragment_shader.c_str();
00329     const char *vv = vertex_shader.c_str();
00330 
00331     //set shader source
00332     glShaderSource(m_v_shader, 1, &vv,NULL);
00333     glShaderSource(m_f_shader, 1, &ff,NULL);
00334 
00335     //compile and detect shader errors
00336     char log[BUFFER]; int len;
00337     glCompileShader(m_v_shader);
00338     glCompileShader(m_f_shader);
00339 
00340     //create and link shader program
00341     m_shader = glCreateProgram();
00342     glAttachShader(m_shader,m_f_shader);
00343     glAttachShader(m_shader,m_v_shader);
00344 
00345 
00346     //do we have tessellation shaders?
00347     if(tess_control != NULL && tess_eval != NULL)
00348     {
00349         m_is_tessellated = true;
00350         //then load, create, compile and attach tessellation shaders
00351         m_tc_shader = glCreateShader(GL_TESS_CONTROL_SHADER);
00352         m_te_shader = glCreateShader(GL_TESS_EVALUATION_SHADER);
00353         string tess_control_shader = version + tess_control->defines;
00354         string tess_eval_shader = version + tess_eval->defines;
00355 
00356         //load and link shader
00357         tess_control_shader += LoadShader(tess_control->source.c_str());
00358         tess_eval_shader += LoadShader(tess_eval->source.c_str());
00359         if(tess_control_shader == "null" || tess_eval_shader == "null")
00360             return false;
00361         const char *tc = tess_control_shader.c_str();
00362         const char *te = tess_eval_shader.c_str();
00363         glShaderSource(m_tc_shader, 1, &tc, NULL);
00364         glShaderSource(m_te_shader, 1, &te, NULL);
00365         glCompileShader(m_tc_shader);
00366         glCompileShader(m_te_shader);
00367         glAttachShader(m_shader,m_tc_shader);
00368         glAttachShader(m_shader,m_te_shader);
00369     }
00370 
00371     //do we have geometry shader?
00372     if(geometry != NULL)
00373     {
00374         //then load, create, compile and attach geometry shader
00375         m_g_shader = glCreateShader(GL_GEOMETRY_SHADER);
00376         string geometry_shader = version + geometry->defines;
00377 
00378         //load and link shader
00379         geometry_shader += LoadShader(geometry->source.c_str());
00380         if(geometry_shader == "null")
00381             return false;
00382         const char *gg = geometry_shader.c_str();
00383         glShaderSource(m_g_shader, 1, &gg,NULL);
00384         glCompileShader(m_g_shader);
00385         glAttachShader(m_shader,m_g_shader);
00386     }
00387 
00388     //final shader linking
00389     glLinkProgram(m_shader);
00390     glUseProgram(m_shader);
00391 
00392     //shader creation status: print error if any
00393     ofstream fout("shader_log.txt", ios_base::app);
00394     glGetShaderInfoLog(m_v_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00395     bool compile_err = false;
00396     //log from vertex shader
00397     if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00398     {
00399         fout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;  
00400         cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;  
00401         compile_err = true;
00402     }
00403     //log from tessellation shaders
00404     if(tess_control != NULL && tess_eval != NULL)
00405     {
00406         glGetShaderInfoLog(m_tc_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00407         if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00408         {
00409             fout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;  
00410             cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;
00411             compile_err = true;
00412         }
00413         glGetShaderInfoLog(m_te_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00414         if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00415         {
00416             fout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;  
00417             cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;
00418             compile_err = true;
00419         }
00420     }
00421     //log from geometry shader
00422     if(geometry != NULL)
00423     {
00424         glGetShaderInfoLog(m_g_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00425         if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00426         {
00427             fout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;  
00428             cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;
00429             compile_err = true;
00430         }
00431     }
00432     //log from fragment shader
00433     glGetShaderInfoLog(m_f_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00434     if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00435     {
00436         fout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;   
00437         cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;
00438         compile_err = true;
00439     }
00440     fout.close();
00441 
00442 
00443 
00444     //*************************************
00446     int i=0;
00447     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00448     {
00449         if(!m_it->second->Empty())
00450         {
00451             m_it->second->GetUniforms(m_shader);
00452             m_it->second->ActivateTexture(i,true);
00453             i++;
00454         }
00455     }
00456 
00458     if(!IsScreenSpace())
00459     {
00460         SetUniform("material.ambient",m_ambColor);
00461         SetUniform("material.diffuse",m_diffColor);
00462         SetUniform("material.specular",m_specColor);
00463         SetUniform("material.shininess",m_shininess);
00464 
00465         //setup uniform buffers
00466         GLuint uniformIndex = glGetUniformBlockIndex(m_shader, "Matrices");
00467         glUniformBlockBinding(m_shader, uniformIndex, UNIFORM_MATRICES);
00468         uniformIndex = glGetUniformBlockIndex(m_shader, "Lights");
00469         glUniformBlockBinding(m_shader, uniformIndex, UNIFORM_LIGHTS);
00470     }
00471 
00472     glUseProgram(0);
00473     m_baked = true;
00474     m_custom_shader = true;
00475     return !compile_err;
00476 }
